fullText: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical Harmony is a deeply personal and moving tribute to the Comedian Harmonists, a German vocal group whose careers were cut short by the rise of Nazi Germany.
dtliExcerpt: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical Harmony is a deeply personal and moving tribute to the Comedian Harmonists, a German vocal group whose careers were cut short by the rise of Nazi Germany.
